"Eradicate Aim - I":
"I hear that the D-Arkers at the mining base in the
Planet Lillipur are going on a rampage.
They are destroying the buildings of the ARKS.
They are really the scum of the universe.
I hear that a large group of them
are pushing on towards us, but if it is you,
it will be easy meat for you. Go and get rid
of them and come back yeah.

*Target Gold Dorada"
"エラディケート・エイム・Ⅰ"

"惑星リリーパの採掘基地でダーカーが
暴れているんだってね。
アークスの建造物を破壊してくるなんて
ヤツらはホント宇宙のゴミだよ。
大群が押し寄せてくるって話だけど
あんたなら楽勝だろ。
根こそぎ、駆逐してきてやってよ。

※ゴルドラーダが対象"
